alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Hall; Howard; Kearney; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 5:48PM CDT until April 29 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Adams County in south central Nebraska... Eastern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Eastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Sherman County in central Nebraska... Southern Howard County in central Nebraska... Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 547 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Boelus to Shelton to near Minden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Wood River and Cairo around 600 PM CDT. Prosser around 605 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Holstein, Roseland, Hastings, Doniphan, Hansen, St. Libory, Grand Island and Ayr. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 285 and 317. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Hall; Howard; Kearney; Sherman
